title: Mini World Of Endless Fun Awaits - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Beasts   Character Growth   Cheats   Comedic Undertone   Demons   Game Elements   Ghosts   Godly Powers   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Identities   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Slow Growth at Start   System Administrator   Weak to Strong   Werebeasts
author: Ting Ri   听日
description:
The extraordinaire has disrupted the silence of the world and ever since then, technology has taken a different path.


When humans find a path for evolution in the dark, I’ll remove my ribs, burn my heart and burn the midnight oil to become their pioneer.


This is the process of a gamer manipulating the world.


Mini world of endless fun awaits.>
